description: Marty couldn’t wait to pound some ass on camera, so he’s back already, and with Joe ready with his ass for the taking! These two studs were all over each other after a quick workout outside…clearly, there was no stopping them…it even got hot and heavy in the car on the way to the house. When all was said and done, cum was blown and eaten…and their hunger was definitely satisfied.
title: Marty & Joe: Bareback
